100011.Helper2: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

100012.Helper2: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

100013.Helper2: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

100014.Helper2: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

100015.Helper2: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

100016.Helper2: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

100017.Helper2: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

100018.Helper2: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

100019.Helper2: A rare plant that grows on steep cliffs with nobility. Shines magnificently in the night.

100020.Helper2: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

100021.Helper2: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

100022.Helper2: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the watchers of the storms found solace in the sweetness of the fruit and the hope for the city's security.

100023.Helper2: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

100024.Helper2: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."

100025.Helper2: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.

100026.Helper2: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

100027.Helper2: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

100028.Helper2: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

100029.Helper2: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.

100030.Helper2: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

100031.Helper2: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

100032.Helper2: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.

100033.Helper2: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.

100034.Helper2: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

100051.Helper2: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

100052.Helper2: A flower bud encased in solid ice. Even after being picked, the flower continues to emit cold.

100053.Helper2: The stamen of a fiercely burning flower. Even after being extinguished, it still emits heat.

100054.Helper2: A power-rich crystal that draws electricity from the air around it. Holding it makes your hand a little numb.

100055.Helper2: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

100056.Helper2: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

100057.Helper2: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

100058.Helper2: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

100061.Helper2: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

100062.Helper2: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

100063.Helper2: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

100064.Helper2: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

100072.Helper2: Brightly colored wings. The powder that falls from them shimmers a little. Perhaps this is what allows them to fly?

100073.Helper2: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

100074.Helper2: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

100075.Helper2: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

100076.Helper2: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

100077.Helper2: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

100078.Helper2: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

100079.Helper2: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

100080.Helper2: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

100081.Helper2: Common frog found in moist environments. Full of energy, they secrete a substance that will keep you full of vitality.

100082.Helper2: The light-emitting part of a firefly. Used for courtship, and in medicine to help recover strength.

100083.Helper2: A lizard tail that curled up after losing its owner. Very bitter, but has skin hardening properties.

100084.Helper2: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

100085.Helper2: The core of a crystal butterfly. It absorbs elemental energy that has escaped into the atmosphere.

100086.Helper2: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

100087.Helper2: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

100088.Helper2: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

100089.Helper2: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

100090.Helper2: A shiny pearl spat out by a loach that has mystical medicinal properties.\nMinerals and elemental particles ingested by the loach condense into these mildly magical beads. When threatened, the loach spits them out to confuse predators and escape with its life.

100091.Helper2: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

100092.Helper2: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

100093.Helper2: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

100094.Helper2: Rare, fresh meat.\nThis species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

101001.Helper2: This iron chunk can be turned into a multitude of handy items in the hands of a skilled craftsman.

101002.Helper2: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

101003.Helper2: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

101004.Helper2: These crystal chunks can be refined into Weapon EXP materials by using Original Resin.\nCrystals from mines that were eroded by the energy of the Ley Lines cannot be processed by ordinary means.

101006.Helper2: A rare and precious ore formed by the unique geographical conditions and Ley Lines of Dragonspine.

101101.Helper2: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords. \nPhilosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

101102.Helper2: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows. \nPhilosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

101103.Helper2: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores. \nPhilosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

101104.Helper2: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts. \nPhilosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

101105.Helper2: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms. \nPhilosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

101206.Helper2: A plant species that only grows in certain regions and islands of the ocean. Though it looks like a fungus of some sort, it actually comes from a substance secreted by certain soft-bodied organisms.

101401.Helper2: Some fabric of fine make. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

101402.Helper2: Red dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

101403.Helper2: Yellow dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

101404.Helper2: Blue dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

100618.Helper2: A Dragontooth you picked up in Dragonspine. Perhaps someone would know something more about it...

100619.Helper2: A Dragontooth infused with vitality. Just its luster and texture are enough to make one uneasy...

104001.Helper2: Character EXP material. Gives 1000 EXP.\nThese experiences are still beneficial even if one does not live in Teyvat.

104002.Helper2: Character EXP material. Gives 5000 EXP.\nThese experiences are very beneficial for journeys into the unknown.

104003.Helper2: Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.\nThese experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

104011.Helper2: Weapon EXP material. Gives 400 EXP.\nA refined ingot with endless possibilities that can be used to enhance weapons.

104012.Helper2: Weapon EXP material. Gives 2,000 EXP.\nFor reasons unknown, this special and refined ore can be absorbed by weapons to greatly increase their strengths.

104013.Helper2: Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.\nLegend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

110000.Helper2: Items produced through the Crafting System.

110001.Helper2: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

110002.Helper2: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

110003.Helper2: Fowl that has been smoked. The firmness of the meat gives new texture to dishes.

110004.Helper2: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

110005.Helper2: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

110006.Helper2: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

110008.Helper2: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

110009.Helper2: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

110010.Helper2: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

110011.Helper2: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.

200001.Helper2: Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.\nThis commonly encountered fibrous material can be processed into lantern wrappings so that the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

200002.Helper2: Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.\nThe commonly encountered velvety material can be processed into lantern wicks so the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

200003.Helper2: Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.\nA mysterious shard of elemental rock that can float by itself. It is the secret to the flying lanterns. It is also said to be the thing that powers the Jade Chamber's floating mechanism.

100001.Helper2: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

100002.Helper2: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

102001.Helper2: A shard that broke off a larger Pyro Crystal. Gives 50 Pyro Energy when absorbed.

102002.Helper2: A shard that broke off a larger Hydro Crystal. Gives 50 Hydro Energy when absorbed.

103001.Helper2: A fruit taken from a Pyro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Pyro Energy when eaten.

103002.Helper2: A fruit taken from the Hydro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Hydro Energy when eaten.
