100348.Helper2: A love letter from Godwin to Glory detailing their love and the intimate things they did, which would make any reader blush. However, only the last part is somewhat memorable.

100349.Helper2: A hefty bottle that came drifting with the waves, carrying tokens of an old friendship and the hopes of being reunited.

100351.Helper2: Cough Syrup made from Sweet Flower that can moderately suppress cough. Due to its sweet and refreshing taste, the syrup is very popular among kids in Mondstadt. Some kids even wish they had a cough so they can get the syrup.

100352.Helper2: A letter from Draff to Sister Grace. It was tightly sealed, but it wasn't enough to withstand the brute force of the hilichurls.

100353.Helper2: All sorts of materials. These should be just enough to make a training dummy.

100354.Helper2: A thick-set letter sent back from Liyue Harbor to Sara. Several feathers are still stuck in the envelope, signifying the effort that carrier pigeon put in and the sort of treatment it received.

100355.Helper2: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

100356.Helper2: A letter from Guy to his father sealed as per regulation of the Knights of Favonius. It is tightly sealed to deter influence of rain and perplexity.

100357.Helper2: A list of ingredients Quinn needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

100358.Helper2: A list of ingredients Margaret needs for her cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

100359.Helper2: A list of ingredients Jack needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

100360.Helper2: A list of ingredients Draff needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

100361.Helper2: A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler in Liyue.

100362.Helper2: A letter written by Xingqiu to the Feiyun Commerce Guild. The handwriting is so messy its barely recognizable.

100363.Helper2: A heavy bag full of Mora provided by the Feiyun Commerce Guild. Enough to purchase every Cor Lapis available in Liyue.

100364.Helper2:
Mir once again chanted the forgotten spell. The maiden was reunited with him again. "So, this is what you truly look like."
"The world is beyond repair. It shall be born anew from the ashes of the last." The mad Celestial Emperor sentenced all living things of the world to a harsh punishment.
"But you, you would understand me, wouldn't you?" The nameless thief who stole the national treasure said to his lord.
"No. No apologies necessary, for you are benevolent."

100365.Helper2: An intact training dummy. Very sturdy, perfect for training.

100398.Helper2: A tightly-sealed letter packed with other supporting documents that prove the bearer of the letter to be a reliable and experienced adventurer.

100399.Helper2: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the legends of stone beasts.

100400.Helper: Records of Jueyun: Palace Beneath the Sea
100400.Helper2: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on ancient fictional stories.

100401.Helper2: Legend has that it contains ancient incantations used to pay respects to Rex Lapis and the yaksha adepti. It also serves as a historical record of the ancient belief in the Geo Archon.

100402.Helper: Records of the Gallant: The Hermit
100402.Helper2: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

100403.Helper2: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

100404.Helper2: A history book compiled and translated from ancient stone tablets of Liyue by the historian Zichang. It contains various fragmented historical events.

100405.Helper2: A poetry collection by Pingshan, The Mystic. The quality of the poems is all over the place, but it has long been a reference book for young poets or poet-wannabes in Liyue.

100406.Helper2: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the social structure and characteristics of the hilichurls.

100407.Helper2: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the beliefs and spiritual world of the hilichurls.

100408.Helper2: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume explores the diverse cultural customs of the hilichurls in relation to Mondstadt's.

100409.Helper: History of Kings and Clans: Prologue
100409.Helper2: A comprehensive history of Mondstadt edited and compiled by the Northland History Society.

100410.Helper2: A history book on the life of the apical ancestor of the Gunnhildr Clan compiled by Eckhart Gunnhildr, a modern historian of Mondstadt. It consists of fragmented stories and legends from the aristocratic period.

100411.Helper2: Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's days as a knight's squire.

100412.Helper2: Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's friendship with a sword-dancer.

100413.Helper2: Field-cooking skills are paramount to surviving in the wilderness. Lynn, a 10-year Adventurers' Guild veteran, teaches you how to cook delicious and fulfilling food in times of emergency in the wilderness!

100419.Helper: Treasure Map of The Vast Blue
100419.Helper2: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

100426.Helper2: A volume out of the "Wonders and Folklore of Liyue" collection, which serves as Liyue's own version of "Tour of the Land of Liyue," an encyclopedia of folk beliefs and customs by Masudi, a scholar from Sumeru. Due to the archaic nature of the author's writing style, it was largely dismissed by the public and publishers alike. "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti" introduces the readers to the various yakshas who fought side-by-side with the Geo Archon.

100428.Helper2: The signature dish of Smiley Yanxiao, the chef of Wangshu Inn. It has a sweet taste but also retains the bitterness of the almonds. Its refreshing taste and mild fragrance shall impress even the adepti.

100429.Helper2: A package that has been left on the ground. It's not very heavy; the sound of something clattering inside can be heard when picking it up. It must contain many small objects.

100430.Helper2: A token lent out from "Childe" of the Fatui. Normally, the people of Liyue only hold rituals to worship the adepti in the peripheral areas of Jueyun Karst; however, he who holds this token may safely enter the residence of the adepti.

100432.Helper2: In ancient times when Axis Mundi was unobstructed, there were nine realms, each a world of its own. The realm of humans was known as the Zhongzhou, while the gods reside in Shenxiao.\nAt the end of the last calamity, a war between the gods broke out. The God King fell, setting the nine realms ablaze, obliterating all living things. The realms have now been born anew, life again thrives, but the passageway between the nine realms by Axis Mundi has been sealed off.\nAn all-new graphic novel on the epic journey in search of the God-King's Halberd begins!

100433.Helper2: Mir, having stumbled onto the journey to retrieve the swords by accident, encountered a huge crisis before the journey had even begun. Imperial Guard and Imperial Escort elites were slain by enemies holding the Ominous Swords. Amidst grave danger, Mir recalled a spell taught by his father. Legend has that, the Celestial Emperor has a young daughter whose name was not known to the world; she now possessed Weiyang's body and revealed herself. Who would prevail? The wielders of the Ominous Swords who had turned into ferocious demons? Or Mir who could somewhat hold his own in a fight?

100434.Helper2: "Just stay with the name 'Weiyang' for convenience's sake on the road. With the official documents from the government in hand, you should be free to go as you wish throughout the kingdom." Still worried about Weiyang, Mir decided to accompany her on her journey and kill any demons they may encounter.\nThough they had already collected five Ominous Swords and all seemed to be well, they knew in their hearts that the way forward would only get more treacherous and perilous.

100435.Helper2:
"Calm down, my son. Listen, Mir. I am not your real father..."
"Noooooo!"
The once Minister of Imperial Banquets was, in truth, Khan the Asura from Jotunheim. Leaving the capital was but an act in collaboration with the Minister of Ceremonies and the Grand Secretary to protect the daughter of the Celestial Emperor.
"The late Celestial Emperor Shenxiao, the now Contra Mundi, was once a dear friend of mine. But now, knowing that you have successfully summoned her, all my wishes have been fulfilled."

100436.Helper2:
"There are many among the military officials who wish to unseal Axis Mundi since the world in chaos would greatly elevate the position and importance of the Martial Artists."
"They want to wage another War of the Asuras?"
"He does."
The tug-of-war between the civil and military officials and the schemes of the past gods once again threatens all of the nine realms!

100437.Helper2: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

100438.Helper2: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

100439.Helper2: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

100440.Helper2: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

100441.Helper: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingxu Pool
100441.Helper2: Diary of a renowned adventurer, Roald. Spots of shiny green moss can be seen among the pages.

100442.Helper2: A clue found in the northern Guili Plains ruins: "To unite in ambition is to be steadfast and immovable for all time."

100443.Helper2: A clue found in the eastern Guili Plains ruins: "Wisdom is like water, it nourishes all those who receive it and in it is a reflection of the truth."

100444.Helper2: A clue found in the southern Guili Plains ruins: "Fortify the bones, that movement be supple when the time comes."

100445.Helper2: A clue found in the western Guili Plains ruins: "Virtue grows tall like a tree, though there be shade it will flourish forever."

100450.Helper2: A censer used for burning incense.

100453.Helper2: A Mondstadt Hash Brown stuffed with chopped Philanemo Mushrooms. It's much tastier and more nutritious than the average hash brown.\nThey say a father who truly loved Mondstadt Hash Browns prepared these for his unborn son.

100454.Helper2: It's a berry that's been digested by a Dendro Slime. From the outside, it appears the same as any other ordinary berry. Will using it for herbal medicine really have any effect?

100455.Helper2: A thick blob of Hydro Slime Condensate. You can't help but get a strange sense of satisfaction while sloshing it in your hands. As for its taste...

100456.Helper2: A Windwheel Aster that's been through the gentle caress of an Anemo Slime. Although it appearance hasn't changed, there seems to be faint puffs of air escaping between your fingers as you hold it in your hand.

100457.Helper2: A delicate fragment of carved stone. It seems to have something inscribed on it, perhaps only locals could decipher its exact meaning...

100458.Helper2: A delicate fragment of carved stone. It seems to have something inscribed on it, perhaps only locals could decipher its exact meaning...

100459.Helper2: A delicate fragment of carved stone. It seems to have something inscribed on it, perhaps only locals could decipher its exact meaning...

100460.Helper2: "...In the beginning, when the people assembled to farm the land..."\nThe transcript seems to be a record of some event...

100461.Helper2: "...A god named Guizhong descended, whose dominion was over Dust, and whose reach shrouded the skies for thousands of miles around..."\nThe transcript seems to be a record of some event...

100462.Helper2: "...The god laid down four commandments for the people..."\nThe transcript seems to be a record of some event...

100463.Helper2: "...Then another god descended, whose dominion was over Geo, and who brought the people of Liyue to this place. Jointly they shepherded the people for their protection..."\nThe transcript seems to be a record of some event...

100464.Helper2: "...And the assembly was named Guili after the names of the two gods..."\nThe transcript seems to be a record of some event...

100465.Helper2: "...and there they fought upon the Guili Plains, where black dust choked the heavens and a thousand rocks splintered..."\nThe transcript seems to be a record of a terrible war...

100466.Helper2: Guizhong's Four Commandments are: "Teach with wisdom, be bound by virtue, fortify the bones, unite in ambition — the convergence of these four shall be known as the 'Guili Assembly.'"\n"...One can bear not to leave one's native land. A treasure lies in Guili, and Guizhong's Four Commandments shall guide those in generations to come who aspire to find it, if they would test themselves against the Four."\nThis transcript seems to be a letter that was left behind by someone...

100467.Helper2: The hidden treasure of Mt. Qingce contains enormous Energy.

100468.Helper2: A report regarding the hidden treasure of Mt. Qingce.

100469.Helper2: A list of lines from Ella Musk. On the front are many terms in Hilichurlian, and the back has some simple footnotes regarding the content...

100472.Helper2: An envelope that has been tightly sealed. Inside is a letter, inked characters, a Dandelion, love, and a wisp of hope. All these will be safely preserved inside until the seal is opened.

100473.Helper2: A gift that was recommended by Marjorie. It isn't very heavy; what kind of souvenirs could be packed inside?

100474.Helper2: A gift from Quinn. He mentioned that Beatrice helped him prepare it.

100475.Helper2: A special dish that Sara had specially made for Jilliana. What dish could it be? And what could be so special about it?

100476.Helper2: A package given from a traveling merchant to Huai'an, boss of the Wangshu Inn. There seems to be some gifts inside. It's heavy enough to pique your interest, but not so heavy as to make you worry.

100477.Helper2: A box containing invoices of goods. Common sense says that to avoid raising any suspicion, it's usually best to not open to open the box and take a peek.

100478.Helper2: Although it only contains papers, it's still pretty heavy. You can't help but to start sympathizing the merchants that deal with them daily.

100479.Helper2: A box containing various invoices. It appears to have been opened once before and then tightly sealed back up. What nature of business could make even one who stumbles upon the box feel at nerve's end?

100480.Helper2: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that portrays an encounter between an unknown young boy and a spring fairy.

100481.Helper2: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts the acquaintance of a spring fairy and a young boy.

100482.Helper2: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts a promise made between a spring fairy and a young boy.

100483.Helper2: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts a bitter ending finally faced by a boy who was no longer young and a spring fairy who had not grown old.

100484.Helper2: A collection of poetry that Linling published at her own expense. It is her first publication, and she is very proud of it.

100485.Helper2: An invoice with information of goods recorded on it. With only a few simple goods listed on it, someone must have selected these items.

100486.Helper2: Some manifests of goods that has only had their numbers checked out. This may seem like a very simple job, but one must still focus in order to ensure that no mistakes are made.

100487.Helper2: Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.\nThis species originally grew under complex hydrological conditions. Its foliage is abundant, its leaves are evergreen, and its stamen is as fair as a Golden House Maiden.

100488.Helper2: Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.\nThis variety originally grew in dark, damp locations. It is known for its profusion of petals, densely packed stamens, and powerful scent.

100489.Helper2: Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.\nIn the past, this strain would grow among cloud-ringed peaks. It is a reclusive species, and has a subtle yet enduring scent.

100490.Helper2: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off a sweet scent.

100491.Helper2: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an intense scent.

100492.Helper2: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an elegant scent.

100493.Helper2: A light and empty box. It doesn't seem as though this fragile container has much protective ability...

100494.Helper2: A box containing cultural relics. Its ponderous weight makes one feel like it could break at any time...

100495.Helper2: A page of a book that has been soaked through in water. It must have been in there for a long time, as the words have become so smudged as to be illegible.

100496.Helper2: Funds provided by Childe. The sense of stability one gets from its weight also makes one unwilling to part with the money...\nThe face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

100497.Helper2: A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.\nIt releases a scent that reminds one of sweet dreams. Perhaps it is the best fit for innocent young ladies.

100498.Helper2: A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.\nIt releases a thick, oppressive aroma. They say that it is very popular among the daughters of wealthy families.

100499.Helper2: A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.\nIt releases a fragrance as elegant as the elusive, smoky mountain mist. One hears that it is a favorite of mature women.

100500.Helper2: A box that contains the gadgets Soraya gave to you. You can feel its weight in your hand. It should be able to satisfy the greed of certain people.

100501.Helper2: It is said that this magic bell was prepared specifically for adepti. Its sound rings through the air and does not fade quickly, and can be used to purify the mortal realm.\nIt seems to have a life of its own, even as you hold it in your hand...

100502.Helper2: Spare parts for the Guizhong Ballista that have been stored away since antiquity.\nWhile they may seem like ordinary components, they have been made with special construction techniques, and to special design specifications.

100503.Helper: A Record of Qiming and Zhihua's Conversation
100503.Helper2: A record of Qiming and Zhihua's conversation. It seems like banal passing of the buck, but it feels like there is some tacit understanding hidden within...

100504.Helper: A Record of Sisi and Chaoxi's Conversation
100504.Helper2: A record of Sisi and Chaoxi's conversation. At first glance, the impression it makes is one of endless evasion, and of avoiding the brunt of work...

100505.Helper: A Record of Little Meng, Little Fei, and Little Lulu's Conversation
100505.Helper2: A record of Little Meng, Little Fei and Little Lulu's conversation. It appears to only be the straightforward conversation of children. But one can dimly sense some unnameable emotion sprouting in the hearts of the children. Perhaps this sprout will continue to gradually grow until its branches stretch out across the skies, no longer able to be ignored by anyone...

100506.Helper2: Norma's food order. You can feel its warmth in your hand.

100507.Helper2: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Recital of Friendship is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

100508.Helper2: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Stirring Narrative is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

100509.Helper2: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Elegant Lyric Poem is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

100510.Helper2: A gift acquired from Vile. Given how heavy it is to hold, there must be quite a lot of items inside.

100511.Helper2: Cultural relics dug up by the Treasure Hoarders, and packed willy-nilly into a box. When you lift the box, it feels like it could collapse at any moment.

100512.Helper2: A seemingly ordinary container that had been trapped in amber. Its weight, once held, is astounding, and no matter what you do, you can't seem to open it...

100513.Helper2: A page that seems to have been forcibly torn out of a book. It has been soaked in water, and the words on it have become illegible.

100514.Helper2: A page with very messy handwriting. The words have been struck out with crude brushstrokes, and it has also been soaked in water to the point where nothing can be made out.

100515.Helper2: A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.\nAn ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

100516.Helper2: Funds provided by Childe. The clinking of the coins within lifts a person's spirits.

100517.Helper2: A trophy taken from a Mitachurl. It seems to be capable of producing a very loud sound, but that probably won't be enough to shake a certain group of people free of their arrogance.

100518.Helper2: A trophy taken from the Treasure Hoarders. This box is very small and isn't very heavy, and will not be able to contain the arrogance of certain people. But it should be more than enough to keep a lid on their tricks.

100519.Helper2: A trophy seized from a Ruin Guard. It does not appear to have much value as a collector's item. But it is heavy enough that it would cause a great deal of pain, were it to be dropped onto a certain arrogant someone's foot.

100520.Helper2: A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.\nAn ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

100521.Helper2: A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.\nAn ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

100522.Helper2: A traditional incense fit for the Rite of Parting, worth 2,990,000 Mora.\nThere are some things in this world whose value can only be appreciated by those who understand them. Perhaps Everlasting Incense is one such thing...?

100523.Helper2: Spare parts for the Guizhong Ballista that have been stored away since antiquity.\nWhile they may seem like ordinary components, they have been made with special construction techniques, and to special design specifications.

100524.Helper2: A wooden plank well-suited to repair work. When people need repairs done, these things always come to mind.

100525.Helper2: A box with some leaves inside. Something feels unusual about it when you hold it in your hand, and you can't help but feel a little uneasy... can this box really contain these leaves?

100528.Helper2: A key carried by a Treasure Hoarder.

100529.Helper2: The treasure is buried beneath the <color=#00E1FFFF>giant golden tree</color> in the middle of Lingju Pass.

100530.Helper2: Anonymous treasure acquired at Qingxu Pool. There is a pattern of unknown significance on the outside. Perhaps you could get someone in Liyue Harbor with an interest in antiques to take a look at it.

100531.Helper2: Anonymous treasure acquired at Lingju Pass. There is a pattern of unknown significance on the outside. Perhaps you could get someone in Liyue Harbor with an interest in antiques to take a look at it.

100532.Helper2: Anonymous treasure acquired at Dunyu Ruins. There is a pattern of unknown significance on the outside. Perhaps you could get someone in Liyue Harbor with an interest in antiques to take a look at it.

100533.Helper2: An unusual gemstone capable of removing a seal somewhere.\nYou can feel the turbulent thoughts racing relentless within when you hold it in your hand. Somewhere in this world are buried the memories of an ancient war.\n"For a future without the pain of savage slaughter, for a future without lives lived in vain, for a future where every day is filled with peace..."

100534.Helper2: A ring that seems to have existed for a long time. Though it has become dull due to erosion over time, it is not dirty because it has been stored inside a box.\nThere are words engraved on the inside of the ring, still clearly legible:\n"All beings suffer in war."

100535.Helper2: Around five paintbrushes of different lengths and widths, wrapped in a cloth and stored in a box. The artist clearly takes excellent care of them.

100536.Helper2: Half a box of paints of different colors. The bottle of white paint seems bigger than the others.

100537.Helper2: An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. For some reason, black and white are the only colors that he used. Vermeer says that his lost paints and brushes are at the <color=#00E1FFFF>viewing spot</color> where he painted this work.

100538.Helper2: An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. He says that his lost paints and brushes are at the <color=#00E1FFFF>viewing spot</color> where he painted this work.

100539.Helper2: A painting that Vermeer completed with the Traveler's help. He says that it is his finest work to date, but still far from perfect. He is determined to keep painting.

100540.Helper2: A circular stone with some text engraved on the side: "The house of stone envelops the timber hut." It seems like it should be fitted inside something...

100541.Helper2: The freshest Qingxin you ever saw. Just bursting with scent when you picked it. It probably needs some further processing before it's ready to brew, though.

100542.Helper2: An extra-special item from the Good Hunter menu. A durable and travel-ready reinvention of their Satisfying Salad, intended as a gift product. Despite this, the original flavor and texture apparently doesn't quite survive long journeys.

100543.Helper2: A bookmark given to you by Flora. Made from a dried-out Windwheel Aster, even in its box you barely notice the weight of it.

100544.Helper2: An extra-special beverage obtained from the Angel's Share. Claimed to be the most cool and refreshing beverage ever, one can certainly feel the wind at the back of the throat more keenly after consuming it.

100545.Helper2: A mint-scented perfume specially prepared for Little Lulu by Ying'er. It's the perfect scent for Lulu, Ying'er says.

100546.Helper2: Essential oil extracted from the Mint plant. Used for making perfume.

100547.Helper2: Crystal-clear, thick and gooey, like gelatine... Could this be the stuff of haute-cuisine dreams?\nApparently, very few people are actually willing to try eating slime, so derivative products are typically passed off as agar-based delicacies. Only die-hard food fanatics can taste the subtle difference between the two.

100548.Helper2: A plant with a rich, sweet fragrance that makes an excellent sweetener.\nSome say plants have feelings too — show them enough care and attention, and they will strive to bloom all the more fragrantly. Sometimes, though, this will then make them the target of people who don't know how to mind their own business.

100549.Helper2: A Sweet Flower picked in the Whispering Woods. A decidedly healthy-looking specimen with a delightfully sweet aroma if you get close enough.

100550.Helper2: A Cecilia picked on Starsnatch Cliff. The whole plant still conveys a quiet sense of gentleness even outside of its natural habitat.

100551.Helper2: A Windwheel Aster picked at Windrise. The petals are still spinning merrily around. It seems the wind has imbued this plant with a healthy dose of vitality.

100552.Helper2: A small lamp grass obtained from the Whispering Woods. It has been unearthed with the utmost care, and neither its stem nor leaf has been bruised.

100553.Helper2: A cocktail ingredient salvaged from a cart. When you hold it in your hand, you can't help but feel that there's something unusual about it.

100554.Helper2: A very hefty bag of cash that Teucer was all too eager to offload onto you... One wonders what sort of family this Snezhnayan kid comes from.\nThe face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

100555.Helper2: Funds for Teucer's entertainment, provided by Childe, now mixed in with the stash you received from Teucer earlier...\nThe face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

100556.Helper2: A Sunsettia, slightly plumper than most, possibly due to unique cultivation conditions. That aside, there doesn't seem to be anything particularly special about it.

100557.Helper2: "The Adventurers' Guild is now recruiting new members! To sign up, speak to Branch Master Cyrus in Mondstadt today."

100558.Helper2: "New drinks at the Cat's Tail. Your bartender today is: Diona."

100559.Helper2: "Try the all-new Good Hunter meal deal! Get 10% off when you purchase a Satisfying Salad and a Sticky Honey Roast in a single order."

100560.Helper2: A huge, heavy bag of gifts bought by Jiayi for his daughter, Little Liu. Perhaps Jiayi would prefer to give it to his daughter himself?

100561.Helper2: A map of Mondstadt carried by a Treasure Hoarder. Someone with terrible handwriting has made some notes on a location not too far away.

100562.Helper2: Anonymously authored notes. They describe a place seemingly not far from here.

100563.Helper2: A circular stone with some text engraved on the side: "To enter, first dot the eyes." It seems like it should be fitted inside something...

100564.Helper2: A code of conduct covering language usage and behavioral norms for Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius, personally edited by Acting Grand Master Jean. All knights are expected to strictly abide by these rules and regulate their words and deeds accordingly.

100565.Helper: Tales From the Waves: Rising Tide
100565.Helper2: The legendary tale of an anonymous seafarer set in a time when Liyue was plagued by sea monsters.

100566.Helper: Tales From the Waves: Wild Storm
100566.Helper2: To the never-ending tune of the ocean, the seafarer fought against the phenomenal foe of fate, fighting to the bitter end...

100567.Helper: Tales From the Waves: Receding Torrent
100567.Helper2: Finally, when the tempest eased and the ocean surface was tranquil once more, the soft wind played a poignant homecoming tune...

100568.Helper2: Sometimes, feelings are like the summer rain, coming out of nowhere and catching you unprepared. A nostalgic summer story set in the age of aristocrats begins right here.

100569.Helper2: Money doesn't solve all your problems, but it can certainly solve a lot of them! A young woman's summer vacation in Mondstadt opens to the melodic tune of a symphonic sum of Mora.

100570.Helper2: Even when you live in a safe city, you should watch out for the wolves that lurk in the night... Something more impossible to master than mass hypnosis is revealed within these pages.

100571.Helper2: Even a dog can learn basic things like upper-class etiquette — or so insists a certain non-nonsense teacher from afar.

100572.Helper2: "Be a good dog! Yes, there's no reward for getting it right, but there's still a punishment for getting it wrong!" The witch in black makeup smirked.

100573.Helper2: When a small-town boy looking to leave his sleepy hometown behind gets lost in a bamboo forest at sundown, what long-forgotten dreams will he encounter?

100574.Helper2: As the moon slowly rises in the night sky, small-town boy meets bamboo-forest girl — but is he voyaging into the realm of the adepti, or setting foot in some monstrous trap?

100575.Helper2: Deep in the bamboo forest, reality has coincided with a story from the distant past. But the crossover ends as the bright moon reaches its peak in the night sky, and small-town boy disappears into an indescribable dream.

100576.Helper2: As dawn gently approaches, the fate of the two youngsters diverges, and they go their separate ways. But the echoes of that ancient story still resound within the forest, waiting for the day that they may welcome small-town boy back into their midst once more.

100577.Helper2: One of many popular tales told of Mondstadt's drinkers. This one is the story of a drunkard who stumbled into wolven territory and the lone, starving wolf he encountered there.

100578.Helper2: One of many Mondstadt tales told of popular drinkers. This story is the one of the time a lone, starving wolf met a drunken Mondstadt man.

100579.Helper2: One of the popular, many tales told by the drinkers of Mondstadt. This drunkard is the one who told the lone wolf of an ancient story.

100580.Helper2: One of many drinking tales popularly told in Mondstadt. This wolf told a tale of wine and wolf to a drunken man of Mondstadt.

100583.Helper2: The designs for the Dwelling in the Clouds, built long ago by Cloud Retainer.

100584.Helper2:
Substance acquired from defeating Dvalin.
A crystal imbued with the winds of antiquity as well as another occult power from within the great dragon's body.

The mighty dragon was once a captive of a cage of toxicity, woven of three poisons:
The foul blood he once ingested, the lies whispered from the Abyss, and the anguish of abandonment.
Through tears shed and songs sung, the unholy spikes that had grown on Dvalin's body were smashed to pieces, and the web that had ensnared him was torn away...
Perhaps these feats were achievable only by a free-spirited traveler from a far-away land.

100585.Helper2:
Some kind of fragment recovered after defeating the Overlord of the Vortex in battle.
In the ancient past, it was used to pin the great beast down.

There once was a time when the inhabitants of this land were terrorized by waves as tall as mountains, torn from their dreams in the dead of night by the deafening roar of tidal waves that would shake the world to its core. Fear of such horrors gradually subsided over the years as peace became the norm.
But no matter: though That Which Lies In The Deep awakens once more, it is powerless to prevent the dawning of a new era.
Perhaps this is just what the one who suppressed the Overlord of the Vortex has been hoping to witness in the millennia since.

100586.Helper2: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Set in an age when the treasures of the world flocked forth, fact merges with fiction and both blend with old dreams in this charming tale set in the commercial port of Liyue.

100587.Helper2: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Between lofty mountain peaks where bounteous jade lies beneath, substantial ideas and empty lies are suddenly shown up side by side.

100588.Helper2: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Iron-clad concepts of rules or equity fade into nothingness in this fantastical tale.

100589.Helper2: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. In an age when scrutiny was laid upon the treasures of the world, one humble witticism was all it took to expose all lies.

100590.Helper2: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of the origins of Jin the Seventy-Second's revenge.

100591.Helper2: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's arrival in Tupi Village.

100592.Helper2: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's duel with the chief of Tupi Village.

100593.Helper2: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's treacherous trek into the mountains.

100594.Helper2: A little bag of gifts collected by Little Liu for her father, Jiayi. Perhaps Little Liu would prefer to give it to her father herself?

100595.Helper2: A reply from Chaoxi to Cui'er. Judging from the sender's attitude, it's unlikely to be a particularly heartfelt letter.

100596.Helper2: A toy made from Starconches by Little Yue. It might not capture the sound of the sea, but it certainly captures the amount of thought he put into it.

100597.Helper2: A letter from Yinxing to Bolai. Short, but tightly sealed.

100598.Helper2: An invoice from Clerk Zhao to Jiangzhou. There are several sheets, each with reams of text on. It seems that Jiangzhou has been putting off the planning for Lantern Rite for a very long time...

100599.Helper: Clerk Zhao's Invoice for Nervous An
100599.Helper2: An invoice from Clerk Zhao to Nervous An. There are several sheets, each with reams of text on. It seems that Nervous An has been putting off collating the statistics on the ships in the harbor for a very long time...

100600.Helper2: A letter from Cui'er to her lover, Chaoxi. It's a rather long letter — presumably packed with page upon page of poignant prose about how much she longs to see him again.

100601.Helper2: Notes written by Henry Morton. They describe a place seemingly not far from here.

100602.Helper2: Jack's map. Huge when unfolded, but currently neatly packed into a box.

100603.Helper2: Jack's Adventurer Handbook. Issued by the Guild to every newly recruited adventurer, Jack has carefully wrapped his in a cloth and packed it into a box.

100604.Helper2: A key used to open a wooden cage.\nOf course, considering what the cage is meant to do, perhaps one should call it a "key meant to lock a wooden cage" instead?

100605.Helper2: A truly exquisite sweet treat that came to a certain someone in a dream. This dream was made a reality through someone else's hard work and, of course, a healthy dose of boom shaka-laka.\nSurely this is a gift fit for someone who belongs to the upper echelons of society.

100606.Helper2: Wild Glaze Lilies used in the Rite of Parting.\nDue to geological changes, Glaze Lilies have lost their natural habitat. They say that these plants understand human hearts, and will grow to be especially beautiful if serenaded with deep and meaningful songs.

100607.Helper: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (IV)
100607.Helper2: After a few days apart, a long-awaited reunion takes place on a midsummer's night amidst a veritable blizzard of dandelion seeds.\nAt the direction of the fox, an ocean of dandelions opens up before the hunter's very eyes...

100608.Helper: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VIII)
100608.Helper2: "When he has mastered human language..." The fox's voice is gently carried away by the midnight breeze, drifting further and further away together with the dandelion seeds...\nAfter all, the fox is a different kind of creature from the human, and the two do not share all the same sense of mirth and misery...

100609.Helper: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (IX)
100609.Helper2: When I have taught all that there is to teach, will it be possible to see this sea of dandelions again...?\nIn the dandelion sea, the hunter starts to contemplate leaving.

100610.Helper2: The Boar Princess and her two wise companions brave an icy wasteland and scale a snowy mountain, where they discover a very mysterious inhabitant indeed...\nSee how this high-altitude, low-temperature adventure unfolds in volume six of The Boar Princess.\nThere is some childish handwriting on the title page, which reads: "Daddy, when you get home, you have to read me the one about the snowy mountain too!"

100611.Helper2: There is a saying that goes as follows: Not all that glitters is gold, sometimes it is the outpouring of a broken heart.\nEither way, the stars in the sky certainly aren't made of gold, and most people's hearts aren't made of glass.\nIn any case — here is the next chapter of Vera's adventure!

100612.Helper2: There was once a great scholar who wished to write a book about all the festive days of the empire.\nAfter looking into it more closely, he discovered that every single day had some sort of a festival associated with it... He persevered with this monumental writing task for six months before giving up on it.\nBut don't worry — as far as this book is concerned, I am the author, and I won't let my readers down!

100613.Helper2: In the star clusters at the outer reaches of the universe, habitable planets are few and far between. For this reason, the region is the playground of space captains and pirates alone.\nWith this being the universe, though, there is no port and starboard in the traditional sense — out here, "starboard" means whichever side of your spacecraft is oriented towards the star you are using for navigation...\nLose yourself, and especially your sense of direction, in this next chapter of Vera's starbound voyage!

100614.Helper2: Of course boys aren't invited to the girl's slumber party! Girls are sacrosanct, like the gods of the golden age.\nVera, the Princess, Saint King Lebannin, and Ur, alpha female of the Galactic Swarm, shall talk deep into the night!

100615.Helper2: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features mysterious hilichurls who live apart from the others.

100617.Helper2: Notes penned by Leonard, an adventurer from antiquity. Most ancient indeed. Mona has used her astrology to interpret its tattered contents and restore them.

100620.Helper2:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I'm afraid I can't finish the fresco."
"It's been a while since I last saw the blue sky and green grass. I don't know which hues to use to capture the landscape of thawing ice and snow that my father so longs for."
"By the time he comes back, everything will be back to how it was. But I can't take this cold anymore."
"Forgive me, Father. Ukko, I'm sorry you had to see us like this."
"Imunlaukr, I wish I could see you again..."

100621.Helper2:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I thought that the young will grow strong and vital like cypresses."
"But these cypresses are about to wither. Their voices won't be carried by the wind anymore. My expectations towards them, as well as the faith they have in me, will all fall through."
"Once again I'll climb this peak looking for guidance. By the time I'm back down, my daughter will have finished the second painting."
"As long as the third one will be of thawing snow and ice, everything will be fine."

100622.Helper2:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I yearn for those frosty skies to stand in flames and burn till there's no living soul in the world."
"I yearn for us to turn to dust carried by the wind so that we can find that outsider who abandoned the princess."
"I yearn for the black dragon from the princess' dreams to engulf the land in a cloud of scarlet poison."
"For I am the last one. There's no need to keep watch any longer."
"I've heard of people who are building a new nation without gods. Perhaps they'll have the power to stand against this world."

100623.Helper2: A Sweet Flower gathered from beside a meteorite. It doesn't look, feel or smell like anything special. Perhaps only Ivanovich knows its true worth...

100624.Helper2: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

100625.Helper2: A "Mr. Cyclops" toy that Childe had specially-made for Teucer. It even has the lad's name on it.

100626.Helper2: A letter that Little Liu wrote to Jiayi. The seal isn't all that tight. Best not to open it...

100627.Helper2: A wooden stake of very common design. It doesn't seem special in any way, other than its slightly smaller bulk. It bears some signs of use, and might have been moved here from elsewhere.

100628.Helper2: A cloth bag made of commonly-found materials. It contains some slightly damp objects. It might have fallen from a merchant vessel.

100629.Helper2: A stone tablet with mysterious markings on it. Its origin cannot be determined, but there is value in analyzing it.

100630.Helper2: A letter obtained from Vile. It has the special mark of the Treasure Hoarders on it.

100631.Helper2: The box that Viktor lost. The wrapping is all crumpled up... but it doesn't look damaged. What important things could it contain?

100632.Helper2: A note written in haste. It lists a number of documents required when applying for a new business license.

100633.Helper2: An old business license. The thick stack has an unnatural weight to it...

100634.Helper2: Proof of one's business premises and the safety of said premises. The thick bundle has an unnatural weight to it...

100635.Helper2: Approval documentation for going out to sea. Best you don't lose this thin sheet of paper...

100636.Helper2: Exquisite flavor, rich in fat. This cut of meat is exceptionally delicious, regardless of preferred cooking technique.\nOnly the most ancient of creatures, the sturdiest of the boars deserves to be called a king.

100637.Helper2: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the origin of Wuwang Hill.

100638.Helper2: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment features the stories of Seelie living in the mountains.

100639.Helper2: This scroll, which seems to be a part of a larger series, belongs to the Jade Chamber's invaluable collection of written works. This volume is a dissertation on Liyue Harbor's economic policy.

100640.Helper2: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

100641.Helper2: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

100642.Helper2: Zixin is a poor fisherwoman whose family struggles to make ends meet. One day, she is selling fish on the street when she carelessly loses the string of pearls she usually wears. Though what she does not know is that this lost string of pearls will change her fate for good...

100643.Helper2: The young man who had returned Zixin's string of pearls left without revealing his name. Grandma Zhang comes up with a plan that will allow Zixin to find him...

100644.Helper2: Our heroine meets the young man again. They fall in love and are ready to live together happily ever after. But a despot who covets Zixin's beauty and virtue is putting the skids under their plans...

100645.Helper2: An investigation journal found in front of the ruins with a circular entrance.\nIts author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

100692.Helper2: An investigation journal found in the basement of the ice-covered ruins.\nIts author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

100693.Helper2: An investigation journal found in the camp on the sunny side of Dragonspine.\nIts author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

100646.Helper2: A Hash Brown made specifically for Silio. Fresh out of the oven and still warm.

100647.Helper2: A newly-made serving of Almond Tofu. It looks very delicious indeed.

100648.Helper2: Warm Jewelry Soup. It's practically spilling out of the bowl.

100649.Helper2: A custom-made Sweet Madame. Such a fragile yet tempting dish is not often seen.

100650.Helper2: Freshly-made Matsutake Meat Rolls. The person who ordered this is in for a real treat.

100651.Helper2: A newly-completed set of Jade Parcels. It exudes a transient, fantastical aroma. If you don't send this out soon...

100652.Helper2: A freshly-served plate of Flaming Red Bolognese. It is a thing of fragile beauty.

100653.Helper2: Black-Back Perch Stew, fresh from the oven. It won't maintain its freshness for long.

100654.Helper2: A serving of Mora Meat. Neither Mora nor Meat will be left if it gets cold.

100655.Helper2: Tea Break Pancake that has just had syrup drizzled over it. Time to serve it to the customers, and fast.

100656.Helper2: A Come And Get It that looks delicious. Specially-made or not, Come And Get It always tastes terrible cold.

100657.Helper2: Especially tender Jueyun Chili Chicken. Eating it cold has some merit, but it's best to serve it hot.

100658.Helper2: A Hash Brown made specifically for Silio. Fresh out of the oven and still warm.

100659.Helper2: Fresh Black-Back Perch Stew. It will probably be inedible once it gets cold.

100660.Helper2: A Come And Get It that looks delicious. Specially-made or not, Come And Get It always tastes terrible cold.

100661.Helper2: Mondstadt Grilled Fish with crispy skin and tender meat. It'll taste terrible if left out for too long.

100662.Helper2: Stir-Fried Filet prepared for Ling'guan. If it was fated to be left to cool, why stir-fry it in the first place?

100663.Helper: Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
100663.Helper2: Lotus on the one hand, and eggs on the other. It feels like you'd be insulting the adepti if you sent this over to Jueyun Karst.

100664.Helper2: This should be finger food, but it also needs to be sent by speed courier. How odd.

100665.Helper2: A newly-made serving of Almond Tofu. It looks very delicious indeed.

100666.Helper2: Warm Jewelry Soup. It's practically spilling out of the bowl.

100667.Helper2: Orders written by Huffman. It's sealed up very tight. Best not to open it yourself...

100681.Helper2: A letter that Jiayi wrote to Little Liu. It is sealed very tightly. Don't open it, now...

100682.Helper2: Jueyun Chili Chicken made personally by Little Wu. According to him, it captures the taste of his youth perfectly, and though Big G will not be able to enjoy it, he may yet remember some of the happiness of his youth.

100683.Helper2: A luxurious toybox from Mumu. This was once something they all desired in their childhood. May all wishes come true in the future.

100684.Helper2: Plaustrite Shards of fine quality. A Xiao Lantern made from such material is sure to carry happy hopes high into the sky.

100685.Helper2: Xiao Lantern obtained from Congzi, and it has the names of the five childhood playmates inscribed upon it. May the fire pass on, and may friendship never die.

100686.Helper2: Dandelion Seeds that contain Glory's thoughts. The wind can probably carry these far, far away.

100687.Helper2: A letter to Cyrus. The handwriting on the envelope looks hasty and careless, reflecting the sender's state of mind.

100688.Helper2: A signature personally penned by the Liyue poet, Qingzhou. He mentioned that you can exchange this signature for a copy of his new anthology at Wanwen Bookhouse. Well, no one knows when he will finish writing that anthology, but at least it makes for a nice memento.

100689.Helper2: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

100690.Helper2: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

100691.Helper2: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. In an age when scrutiny was laid upon the treasures of the world, one humble witticism was all it took to expose all lies.

100699.Helper2: The invoice for the furniture that Second Life purchased from Fanmu Carpenter's. It features detailed information regarding that transaction.

100700.Helper2: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

100701.Helper2: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

100702.Helper2: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

100703.Helper2: A crumpled note featuring hastily written characters. One can imagine the state its author was in when they wrote it.

100704.Helper2: A potion that Albedo made using alchemy. Despite its unusual color, Albedo insists that the potion will work just as expected. Drinking it should not cause any adverse side effects.

100705.Helper2: Rare, fresh meat.\nThis species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

100706.Helper: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Dragonspine
100706.Helper2: A journal left behind by a renowned adventurer Roald. Some of its pages are damaged and crumpled, and a few shimmering ice crystals are attached to them.

100707.Helper2: A picture printed out by the Kamera. It's very clear.

100708.Helper2: A picture printed out by the Kamera. It's very clear.

100709.Helper2: Normally, the people of Liyue only hold rituals to worship the adepti in the peripheral areas of Jueyun Karst; however, he who holds this token may safely enter the residence of the adepti.

100710.Helper2: A dish of delicate texture stewed in fresh cream. So warm and comforting that it makes one feel at home.

100711.Helper2: A map that records the location of treasure.

100712.Helper2: A strange note that seems to contain some sort of message...

100713.Helper2: A bag of Mora. Not the heaviest, but one would not mind finding it on the street.

100714.Helper2: A water-logged box. It is packed very tightly — its contents seem to be of much importance...

100715.Helper2: This scroll, which seems to be a part of a larger series, belongs to the Jade Chamber's invaluable collection of written works. This volume is a dissertation on Liyue Harbor's economic policy.

100721.Helper2: Dropped by <color=#FF5E41FF>the Fatui, hilichurls</color>, and <color=#FF5E41FF>Abyss Mages</color>. Can also be harvested from plants.\nCommon fibrous material that can be processed into lantern wrappings so that the lanterns can float away with their beautiful wishes.\nFound in Liyue.

100722.Helper2: Dropped by <color=#FF5E41FF>fluffy enemies</color> and <color=#FF5E41FF>small animals</color>. Can also be harvested from plants.\nCommon velvety material that can be processed into lantern wicks so that the lanterns can float away with their beautiful wishes.\nFound in Liyue.

100723.Helper2: A Xiao Lantern made by Dummy. It looks surprisingly intricate...

100729.Helper2: A Xiao Lantern given to Wrench Wang by Siyu as a gift.

100716.Helper2: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.

100717.Helper2: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.
