1016.Helper2: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

1020.Helper2: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

1021.Helper2: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

1022.Helper2: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

1023.Helper2: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

1024.Helper2: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

1025.Helper2: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

1026.Helper2: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

1027.Helper2: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

1029.Helper2: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

1030.Helper2: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

1031.Helper2: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

1032.Helper2: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

1033.Helper2: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

1034.Helper2: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

1035.Helper2: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

1036.Helper2: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

1037.Helper2: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

1038.Helper2: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

1039.Helper2: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

1041.Helper2: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

1042.Helper2: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

1043.Helper2: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

1044.Helper2: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

1045.Helper2: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

1046.Helper2: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

1047.Helper2: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

1048.Helper2: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

1051.Helper2: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

3021.Helper2: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

3022.Helper2: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

200201.Helper2: When a character initiates a Plunging Attack, they will unleash a shockwave that deals AoE DMG to opponents. This effect can be triggered once every 8s per character.

200202.Helper2: Continuous gliding or leaving the ground due to jumping will grant the current character a stack of Steelwing every 0.3s, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. When characters initiate Plunging Attacks, each Steelwing stack will increase the DMG of that attack by 35%. This will consume all the stacks of Steelwing that this character possesses.

200203.Helper2: When a character's Plunging Attack hits an opponent, it will generate Elemental Particles that regenerate 6 energy and an Anemo Amber that will generate a wind current. This effect can be triggered once per 8s, and this CD is shared between all characters in the party.

200204.Helper2: All party members' Plunging Attack DMG increased by 40%.

200205.Helper2: After characters use Charged Attacks to defeat opponents, the Charged Attacks of all characters in the party will be increased by 35% for 60s. Each of these effects can stack up to 5 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s.

200206.Helper2: If the current character is a bow user, hitting opponents' weak spots with Charged Attacks will grant the Ironbow effect, which will increase the CRIT Rate of Normal and Charged Attacks by 50% for 8s.

200207.Helper2: Defeating opponents with a character's Charged Attack will create a Vacuum Field that pulls nearby opponents in and deals DMG based on 500% of the character's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 2s, and this effect's CD is shared between all characters in the party.

200208.Helper2: All party members' Charged Attack DMG increased by 30%.

200209.Helper2: Decreases all party members' Charged Attack Stamina consumption by 50%.

200210.Helper2: Characters possess 5 stacks of the Blade Dance effect, and each stack increases the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the character by 15%. Possessing 5 stacks will increase Normal ATK SPD by 15%. When a character takes DMG, they will lose 1 stack of Blade Dance. A maximum of 1 stack can be lost every second in this way. A character will gain one stack of Blade Dance for every 10s they are on the field, up to a maximum of 5 stacks. Each character's CDs, stack counts, and their effects are counted independently.

200211.Helper2: When a character protected by a shield hits an opponent with a Normal Attack, their ATK is increased by 10%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 8s. This effect, its stacks, and its duration are independently calculated for every character.

200212.Helper2: For 20s after an Elemental Burst is used, the character who unleashed that Elemental Burst has their Normal Attack DMG increased by 40%.

200213.Helper2: All party members' Normal Attack DMG increased by 30%.

200214.Helper2: When any party member uses an Elemental Burst, the Elemental Roundabout effect is generated, which increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 100 for 20s, stacking up to 3 times. If this effect is triggered again at 3 stacks, a shockwave that deals AoE DMG will be unleashed.

200215.Helper2: When Normal Attacks hit opponents, they have a 50% chance to regenerate 5 Energy for themselves. This effect can be triggered once every 4s per character.

200216.Helper2: For 8s after a character uses an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents have a 50% chance to generate an Elemental Particle that regenerates 2 Energy. Each character can generate this effect once every 1.7s.

200217.Helper2: Elemental Burst DMG dealt by all party members increased by 30%.

200218.Helper2: After using an Elemental Burst, all party members on the field will unleash one shockwave that scales on 600% of the ATK of the character that unleashed that shockwave, and which deals DMG to nearby opponents. This effect can occur once every 2s and its CD is shared between all characters in the party.

200219.Helper2: Increases the Elemental Burst Level of all party members by 1.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

200221.Helper2: All party members' Energy Recharge increased by 30%.

200222.Helper2: When a character causes opponents to be Electro-Charged, there is a 50% chance to trigger a lightning strike that deals 500% of the triggering character's ATK as DMG and decreases the opponent's Electro RES by 25%. This effect can be triggered once every 5s and this CD is shared between all party members.

200223.Helper2: When a character hits an opponent with an Elemental Burst, a Hydro Amber that will create falling rain in an AoE when shattered will be generated. This effect can be triggered once every 6s and this CD is shared between all party members.

200224.Helper2: All characters in the party have their Elemental Mastery increased by 100.

200225.Helper2: When a character causes opponents to Superconduct, there is a 50% chance to trigger a falling icicle that deals 500% of the triggering character's ATK as DMG and decreases the opponent's Physical RES by 25% for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 5s and this CD is shared between all party members.

200226.Helper2: Character Normal and Charged Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo are increased by 30%.

200227.Helper2: All party members receive a 30% Physical DMG Bonus.

200228.Helper2: When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by a Geo Elemental Reaction, a small shockwave will be unleashed that will deal 500% of that character's ATK as DMG to nearby opponents. Additionally, all characters in the party gain a 40% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s after this effect is triggered. These effects can be triggered once every 5s and this CD is shared between all party members.

200229.Helper2: When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by a Geo Elemental Reaction, they gain a 30% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s.

200230.Helper2: When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by a Geo Elemental Reaction, they will regenerate 2 Energy for all members of the party. This effect can be triggered once every 2s and this CD is shared between all party members.

200231.Helper2: All party members' Shield Strength increased by 35%.

200232.Helper2: When a character hits opponents, a shockwave will be unleashed that deals AoE DMG. When characters are at full HP, the DMG dealt will be increased further. This effect can be triggered once every 5s per character.

200233.Helper2: While protected by a shield, characters gain a 40% incoming healing bonus.

200234.Helper2: Increases all party members' incoming healing bonus by 25%.

200235.Helper2: When a character's Charged Attacks hit an opponent that is under 30% HP, an executioner's blade will descend and deal immense DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 10s and this CD is shared between all party members.

200236.Helper2: When an opponent is defeated, it will release a shockwave that deals AoE DMG to other opponents.

200237.Helper2: When there are no more than 2 opponents near a character, ATK is increased by 20% and DEF increased by 20%.

200238.Helper2: A tiny piece of an Irminsul Fruit. You can almost feel a small amount of energy leaking out of its broken face.

200239.Helper2: A small piece of an Irminsul Fruit. You can somewhat feel the energy that flows gradually from its broken sections.

200240.Helper2: A sizable piece of an Irminsul Fruit. You can feel its broken edges brim over with restless power.

140001.Helper2: A stylized wind glider that bears the passionate longing of an Outrider.

140002.Helper2: A stylized wind glider upon which is inscribed the wish to soar together.

140003.Helper2: A stylized wind glider that can be used to cross the celestial heights.

140004.Helper2: A stylized wind glider gifted to you as a mark of Mondstadt's acknowledgment and recognition.

140005.Helper2: A stylized wind glider gifted to you as a mark of Liyue's acknowledgment and recognition.

140006.Helper2: A stylized wind glider left behind by a bird of prey that once soared among these mountains.

140007.Helper2: A pair of wings that memorialize great banquets or ordinary dinners. All the enjoyment of a feast, for the price of a simple meal.

101301.Helper2: Timber obtained from birches. It is easy to work with and produces smooth cuts. Furniture made using such wood is both beautiful and durable.\nCan be used to create furnishings.

101302.Helper2: Timber obtained from Cuihua Trees. With its lovely color and unique make, it will surely be able to take on myriad uses upon undergoing suitable workmanship.\nCan be used to create furnishings.

101303.Helper2: Timber obtained from pines. Its color and grain are nothing to write home about, but its unpretentious nature is elegant in its own right. The wood is very sturdy as well. In able hands, its products should be able to resist moth and rot alike.\nCan be used to create furnishings.

101304.Helper2: Timber from the Sandbearer Tree. Said to be an exceptionally hardy plant resistant to wind and rain with a long lifespan.\nCan be used to create furnishings.

101305.Helper2: Segments of bamboo that are light and far stronger than their humble appearance might suggest. It lets off a light fragrance.\nCan be used to create furnishings.

101307.Helper2: Wood from the Cedar tree. Also known as the "Fragrant Cedar" for the aromatic oils it contains.\nCan be used to create furnishings.

101308.Helper2: Wood from the tree known as "Faber's Fir." Widely used for its fine quality and attractive grain.\nCan be used to create furnishings.

210.Helper2: A crystal that temporarily revitalizes Irminsul to grant you ancient treasures. The energy within regenerates over time.

211.Helper2: A crystal that temporarily revitalizes Irminsul to grant you great treasures. The energy within regenerates over time.

221.Helper2: Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.\nSurplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

222.Helper2: Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.\nSurplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

223.Helper2: A fateful stone that connects dreams.\nIts glimmers can entwine fates and connect dreams, just as how its glimmers links stars into the shapes of a heart's desires.

224.Helper2: A seed that lights up the night.\nNo matter the distance apart, guided by the stone's glimmer, the fated will meet under the stars.

301.Helper2: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

302.Helper2: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

303.Helper2: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

304.Helper2: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

305.Helper2: An insignia that shows the recognition of the winds of Mondstadt.\nCan be exchanged for special items in Mondstadt.

306.Helper2: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

307.Helper2: An insignia that shows the recognition of the cliffs of Liyue.\nCan be exchanged for special items in Liyue.

1201.Helper2: An early draft of a traveler's tale, recording the many things they saw on their journey across the lands. But why does it exist? It is almost as if you have been here before...\n\nUse this item to unlock Gnostic Hymn for a single period.

1202.Helper: Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon
1202.Helper2: A ritual prayer, recited on the rising of the first new moon, to ask for the moon's blessing in the form of wealth and good fortune. For your purposes, the new moon you shall pray to is the first-ever new moon in Teyvat, since it's the first one you've seen here.\n\nUse this item to receive 30 days of Blessing of the Welkin Moon rewards.

100225.Helper2: Used to trap beasts of a certain size. If you pay attention in the wilds to collect them, you can make one like this. Set one down, and then conceal it carefully.

104201.Helper2: A device that can transmute elemental Ascension Materials and change their Elemental Type.\nIts practical uses notwithstanding, alchemy is the study of the nature of matter and the rules that underpin its transformations, and ultimately it seeks to comprehend the working principles of the world and the flow of the ley lines.\nIt is not known who would share alchemical achievements of this magnitude with the civilizations of the world and why. But although the power to fundamentally transmute elemental energy in its crystallized and inert form is a highly useful one, this device also conceals the grave danger of disrupting the elemental balance...

106001.Helper2: Test item for increasing max stamina temporarily

107002.Helper2: Shattered fragments of the Oculus Crystal. Shows hidden treasure nearby.

107006.Helper2: A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Mondstadt.\nThese Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

107007.Helper2: A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Liyue.\nThese Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

107013.Helper2: A small bottle that seals some adeptal energy within. Will immediately complete a furnishing when used.

113021.Helper2: An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.\nPeople once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.\nIndeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

116001.Helper2: Your travel diary contains all that you have experienced in your long journey. These experiences shall someday become the stuff of song.

118002.Helper2:
A souvenir left over from a very special day.

Here's to you, the brightest star in the night sky.
Wishing you a joyous journey in this great big world.

"This must be the first time we've celebrated this special day. Every week, we update the recommended dishes, every month, the moon will send down new blessings, but wow, it's almost nine thousand hours to go before we celebrate this day again!"

200101.Helper2: Small crystals obtained from monster habitats on Dragonspine.\nThey are only generated at special times.

200102.Helper2: Pieces of crystal obtained from monster habitats on Dragonspine.\nThey are only generated at special times.

220007.Helper2:
You can hold no more than 5 at a time.
Condensed tree resin that can be used instead of Original Resin to revitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms to receive greater rewards.
Crystal filled with immense energy.
The silver-white Irminsul trees and blossoms are connected to ley lines that have become blocked over time. The energy contained in tree resin can purify the obstructing substance.

221001.Helper2: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Anemoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Anemoculi.

221002.Helper2: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Geoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Geoculi.

221003.Helper2: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Geo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Liyue.

221004.Helper2: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Wind Catcher. A Wind Catcher can absorb the energy of Anemograna and release it when needed to create a wind current.

221005.Helper2: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Portable Waypoint. With a Portable Waypoint, you can create a teleport waypoint wherever in the world you want.

221006.Helper2: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Adepti Seeker's Stove. Learn it and you can create a portable stove to bring with you on your travels.

221007.Helper2: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making Condensed Resin. Using resin in this condensed form to activate certain Ley Line Blossoms and Petrified Trees will increase your efficiency. You can hold no more than 5 Condensed Resin at a time.

221008.Helper2: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Nutrition, Ready-to-Eat (NRE) meal-in-a-pouch. Learn it and you can create a tool that makes ingesting food much quicker.

221009.Helper2: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Anemo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Mondstadt.

221017.Helper2: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Warming Bottle. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to resist Sheer Cold.

221010.Helper2: Through this memory, you can master the method to make a Snow-Tombed Starsilver (Claymore).

221011.Helper2: Through this memory, you can master the method to make a Frostbearer (Catalyst).

221012.Helper2: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dragonspine Spear (Polearm).

101.Helper2: Character EXP, used to level up characters.

102.Helper2: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

105.Helper2: Companionship EXP. Used to increase Friendship levels.

106.Helper2: Used to vitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms, allowing access to the treasures they hold. Energy regenerates over time.\nIt is said that the roots of all the Irminsul trees and blossoms in the world are intertwined at the deepest, most hidden place in the earth, and that the pattern the root system makes defines the Ley Lines of the world.

107.Helper2: A key used to unlock Story Quests.\nObtained by completing the required number of Daily Commissions.

109.Helper2: A collection of celestial energy.\nCan be exchanged for treasure during the "Unreconciled Stars" event.

110.Helper2: Distilled celestial energy.\nCan be exchanged for valuable treasure during the "Unreconciled Stars" event.\nThe essence of a faraway star. The power emanating from within is warm to the touch.

111.Helper2: A collection of vital energy that exudes a faint glimmer of light.\nCan be exchanged for treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

112.Helper2: A collection of vital energy that exudes a gentle warmth.\nCan be exchanged for precious treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

113.Helper2: A wondrous energy capable of reviving and mutating a withered Cryo Regisvine.\nCan be exchanged for invaluable treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

114.Helper2: An ancient type of coinage that Ulman is collecting. Perhaps he may offer you something in exchange for Iron Coins.\nLong ago, there was once an organization that attempted to found their own nation. These coins were the nation's minted currency at the time.

115.Helper2: Jade talismans that can be obtained during Lantern Rite. The people of Liyue believe that these talismans can bring and defend peace. You might be able to exchange these for some things during Lantern Rite...

116.Helper2: The festive mood during Lantern Rite. Perhaps the atmosphere on the day of the Rite will be better the higher the Festive Fever is...

117.Helper2: A resource used to build all manner of mechanisms in the Theater Mechanicus. Still, the word "veneficus" itself seems to come from some old book...

118.Helper2: Take part in the celebratory activities of the Windblume Festival to obtain these tickets and exchange them in the event shop for rewards.\nThe people of Mondstadt are fun-loving by nature, and they have a celebration for the seasons, the harvests of different crops, and the anniversaries of events of historic significance. Perhaps there might be a festival to commemorate the outlander who repelled Stormterror someday...?

119.Helper2: Take part in the Windblume Festival event Domain to obtain these coupons and exchange them in the event shop for rewards.\nThis Domain of exceeding peculiarity is also part of the Windblume Festival celebrations, and it displays the fun-loving nature of Mondstadt's people.

120.Helper2: The true heart of an Oceanid. This item is truly hard to find, for one must become one with the waters to truly perceive the heart of the springs.

121.Helper2: Accumulate this to increase your Trust Rank.

122.Helper2: Irminsul Fruit fragment data that you have obtained via calculations and analysis performed by the Energy Amplifier. It contains a vast bounty of knowledge that may yet lead to surprising gains if you use it well.

123.Helper2: The currency that is awarded for participating in Windtrace.\nThe "background settings" of this same game will change in different areas. Though it is still a game of chase-and-catch, the fleeing party are named the "Rebels" in Mondstadt, while their pursuer is the "Hunter," symbols both of the ancient resistance and oppression.\nOf course, the children of Mondstadt know well that this is just a game, and no true sense of enmity emerges as they play.

124.Helper2: Shells brought in by the tide that shine gorgeously, filled with the breath of the sea.\nCan be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Midsummer Island Adventure" event.

125.Helper2: These crystal-clear marbles have a bright feather sealed within them, making them miniature harpasta that are easy to collect.\nCan be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Midsummer Island Adventure" event.

126.Helper2: Intricately crafted parts from Dodofortresses that look rather valuable. Can be exchanged for rewards.

203.Helper2: An energy crystal from the very origin of the universe. Formed from within nothingness out of pure potential and hope, it contains enough energy to create a newborn star.

204.Helper2: Currency of the realm. Used within the Serenitea Pot to exchange for various items.

210002.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe most difficult part of writing a travel journal is coming up with the beginning.

210004.Helper2: Namecard style.\nKlee's lucky explosive — can you tell if it's Jumpy Dumpty or Dodoco? (Hint: Look carefully at the tail...)

210005.Helper2: Namecard style.\nMaster Crepus painted many eagles during his lifetime, but he never could've foreseen creating an eagle with such fire.

210006.Helper2: Namecard style.\nIt's quite a sight to behold Razor and the wolves prepare their dinner, but they won't let Klee or the Traveler see the slightly gruesome affair.

210007.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.

210008.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe dandelion, also called "lion's fang" by some, is the flower most sensitive to the direction of the wind.

210009.Helper2: Namecard style.\nWhen Barbara sings, her melodic voice flows like the tender healing of a clear spring.

210010.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?

210011.Helper2: Namecard style.\nAn hourglass marks the end of the work day for Lisa. Its sand moves fast.

210012.Helper2: Namecard style.\nIf you closely examine an Anemo Hypostasis before it disappears, you will discover that they are actually quite square.

210013.Helper2: Namecard style.\nA raven dark as midnight with wings that can block out the sun. "I permit thee to conceive his likeness upon such decoration!"

210014.Helper2: Namecard style.\nNoelle is quite special. Noelle won't let any harm come to you.

210015.Helper2: Namecard style.\nA girl gazes down at the stars' reflection on the water, pondering the joys and sorrows of life.

210016.Helper2: Namecard style.\nA sign of recognition from Benny's Adventure Team.

210017.Helper2: Namecard style.\nTry saying this three times fast: "Guoba sears sea snails by Liyue's sea shore."

210018.Helper2: Namecard style.\nCome watch the night rain that brings no rainbow.

210019.Helper2: Namecard style.\nWhat should be kept in the fridge? Dr. Baizhu's herbs, coconut milk... and Hu Tao.

210020.Helper2: Namecard style.\nIt was originally invented to just test out one's surroundings and climb to high places, really...

210021.Helper2: Namecard style.\nAfter all your wanderings throughout the world, do not forget the reason why you first set out.

210022.Helper2: Namecard style.\nAfter mastering these skills, you may just find that you can get by just fine without engaging in battle. If you are without any commission to complete, that is.

210023.Helper2: Namecard style.\nYour hero's journey began before you knew it, but it's the experiences that really made it special.

210024.Helper2: Namecard style.\nListen to the singing of Mondstadt's birds and winds.

210025.Helper2: Namecard style.\nWitness the lonely, cloud-covered peaks of Liyue.

210026.Helper2: Namecard style.\nLight can refract into countless colors, but people stop at seven because they're lazy to count. Perhaps the elements are like that, too.

210028.Helper2: Namecard style.\nEven if you're just going out to get a single dandelion, there will be obstacles in your path. But you love a challenge, don't you?

210029.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe deeper you delve, the more secrets you shall uncover.

210030.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe hilichurls were dubbed the "hill devils." But a certain young girl named Musk insists on calling them the "hill dwellers."

210031.Helper2: Namecard style.\nYou've heard many stories about Snezhnaya. What does it look like in your mind's eye?

210032.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThey say that storytellers love their cliffhangers — but you? You've heard it all before.

210033.Helper2: Namecard style.\nWe shall meet again someday.

210038.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThey say that "more's the pity that phoenixes are few." But seriously, one Ningguang is more than enough...

210039.Helper2: Namecard style.\n"Weighing anchor out to sea, one is wont to waver. But look to the skies, and the stars shall light the way."

210040.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThis was originally a peachwood sword made of ice. But a big enough ice block makes a better exorcist's tool than peachwood.

210041.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThat which awaits at the end of the challenges is...

210042.Helper2: Namecard style.\nSo long as there is still desire left in your heart, when you hold your head high you will see that which glitters but is not light.

210043.Helper2: Namecard style.\nAll who have Kätzlein blood will have such feline features. An ancient prank played by a certain someone, perhaps?

210045.Helper2: Namecard style.\nXinyan only has time to examine her instrument carefully after the performance is over. Even in silence, it is a beauty.

210046.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThis bears all the marks of that fellow who gallivants as he pleases across the continent with his ever-changing combat styles. Yet, his "Foul Legacy" was not originally his. Rather, it was taught to him by that solitary girl who dwelt in the darkest corners of the universe.

210047.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe name of the Honorary Knight has spread far and wide among the citizenry.

210048.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThey who have it in their hearts to bless others shall themselves be blessed.

210049.Helper2: Namecard style.\nMany boats have been numbered by day and night.

210050.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe peaks adorn the clouded moon.

210051.Helper2: Namecard style.\nFinally, a worthy opponent! Our battle will be legendary!

210052.Helper2: Namecard style.\nA draconian peak must be scaled.

210053.Helper2: Namecard style.\nDo no harm to plant nor insect.

210054.Helper2: Namecard style.\nAllow me to bear witness to this miracle.

210055.Helper2: Namecard style.\nRemember to keep warm when setting foot on the mountain.

210056.Helper2: Namecard style.\nWe shall rise again — the tree of old has sprouted anew.

210057.Helper2: Namecard style.\nMy opponent for today seems to have an artistic temperament.

210058.Helper2: Namecard style.\nHe longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.

210059.Helper2: Namecard style.\nDirector Hu Tao isn't scary at all. Probably.

210060.Helper2: Namecard style.\nWhen everyone's wishes are gathered together, they can light up the long night.

210061.Helper2: Namecard style.\nEvery year on this day, the lanterns light up the night. May the fire never die, and may humanity endure.

210062.Helper2: Namecard style.\nYou claim to have seen all mechanisms, but have you ever considered playing yourself as a pawn?

210063.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe unselfish warmth and goodwill of the people is, to her, a kindness that she must repay, and so it is an indenture that follows her forever.

210064.Helper2: Namecard style.\nWho has seen the wind? Neither you nor I. Nor has anyone ever seen love, till a bouquet comes flying by.

210066.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe universe does play host to just such a snake, whose scales glitter with precisely these colors.

210067.Helper2: Namecard style.\nWhat knowledge might the fruit of wisdom bring, were it to descend upon the land? Either way, it'll taste good as a drink if left in Diona's hands.

210068.Helper2: Namecard style.\nYou can't see me. You can't see me.

210070.Helper2: Namecard style.\nA cold heart is but a shell to protect oneself.

210071.Helper2: Namecard style.\nHow many nights have you spent with a stone for your pillow?

210072.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe days and months pass within the teapot.

210073.Helper2: Namecard style.\n"The pine-song ripples as red leaves billow."

210075.Helper2: Namecard style.\nThe world is wide under the eaves.

210076.Helper2: Namecard style.\nImagine the vast expanse of a sea of stars. Imagine a one followed by a hundred zeros.

210077.Helper2: Namecard style.\n"In a land far, far away, there was a kingdom known as the Grand Alliance, and the people living there could throw ever-changing, quick, and powerful Kaboomballs."

210078.Helper2: Namecard style.\nGood omens must appear thrice for good fortune to come. One bows thrice at curtain call. The opponents to defeat number three.

340000.Helper2: Barbara's beach attire. This pretty skirt brims with summer vitality and carries with it a cool ocean breeze.

340001.Helper2: Jean's summer wear. Light and cool, but no less elegant for it. The perfect choice for a trip to the seaside.

1002.Helper2: The princess of the renowned House Kamisato of Inazuma. She's the embodiment of nobility and elegance.

1003.Helper2: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

1005.Helper2: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

1006.Helper2: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

1007.Helper2: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

1014.Helper2: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

1015.Helper2: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

1016.Helper2: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

1020.Helper2: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

1021.Helper2: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

1022.Helper2: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

1023.Helper2: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

1024.Helper2: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

1025.Helper2: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

1026.Helper2: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

1027.Helper2: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

1029.Helper2: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

1030.Helper2: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

1031.Helper2: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

1032.Helper2: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

1033.Helper2: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

1034.Helper2: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

1035.Helper2: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

1036.Helper2: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

1037.Helper2: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

1038.Helper2: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

1039.Helper2: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

1041.Helper2: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

1042.Helper2: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

1043.Helper2: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

1044.Helper2: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

1045.Helper2: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

1046.Helper2: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

1047.Helper2: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

1048.Helper2: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

1051.Helper2: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

3021.Helper2: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

3022.Helper2: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

100121.Helper2: Common cricket. Can be seen everywhere, nothing rare about it at all.

100122.Helper2: A big blue cricket. Seems to have a powerful bite force. Should be good at battle.

100123.Helper2: A rare cricket with seven different red and purple layers to its wings.

100124.Helper2: Oh, wow! The Legendary Golden Cricket!

105002.Helper2: Artifact EXP material. Gives 2,500 EXP.\nMaterial that contains the distilled essence of great power. It can contribute to the enhancement of artifacts.

105003.Helper2: Artifact EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.\nArtifacts are themselves the physical manifestation of ideals and memories. Materials such as this, which contain the distilled essence of the power thereof, can make these memories and ideals clearer and stronger still.

107001.Helper2: A substance that has accumulated intense Anemo energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

107003.Helper2: A substance that has accumulated intense Geo energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

107009.Helper2: An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.\nThis crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin.\nThe flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in this world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

107010.Helper2: A type of crystal formed from the combination of concentrated life force with an energy unique to Dragonspine. Makes for an ideal nutrient for growing Frostbearing Trees.

107011.Helper2: A type of crystal formed from the combination of concentrated life force with an energy unique to Dragonspine. Makes for an ideal nutrient for growing Frostbearing Trees.

107012.Helper2:
An item that can be used to replenish Original Resin. Once used, it will replenish 60 Original Resin.
Once obtained, it will <color=#FF5E41CC>automatically dissipate</color> after a period of time.
·The expiration time will be calculated from the Monday after this item is obtained, and it will disappear seven days from then.
·Multiple Transient Resins obtained on different weeks will have their expiration dates counted independently.

Pure energy that will dissipate with time. In this, it is similar to all else that is lovely in this world. But seize this opportunity and go make the world a slightly better place, as is fitting for one who dwells within the bounds of "time."
